version_description:
Major Daily Reading Refresh!

- New, easier-to-navigate interface
- Plans are easier to find
- Set reminders to read your reading plans when you choose
- Study a topic for a week or go through the Bible in a year
- Many different plans to choose from
- Minor bug fixes

If you enjoy the app, please leave us a review. We appreciate it!

Major Daily Reading Refresh!

- New, easier-to-navigate interface
- Plans are easier to find
- Set reminders to read your reading plans when you choose
- Study a topic for a week or go through the Bible in a year
- Many different plans to choose from
- Minor bug fixes

If you enjoy the app, please leave us a review. We appreciate it!

We regularly bring updates to ensure you have the best Bible reading and study experience.

- This update contains bug fixes and also restores the Reading Plan completion date.

If you enjoy using the Olive Tree Bible App please leave us a review in the app store!

Thanks for using the Olive Tree Bible App!
We've added the ability to easily search your library by title, author or publisher.
We also fixed a number of bugs that were trying to get in the way of your reading and study.
If you enjoy the app please leave us a review. It really means a lot!

We've got a new update for you! This time, we've made it possible for select devotionals to appear as reading plans. Now it will be even simpler for you to keep track of your daily time with God! We've made this change to our most popular devotionals, and soon more will be available. Look out for resource updates!

We are so excited to announce a new update for our app. Our developers and designers have been working hard on this update for quite some time.

The fresh layout will help you get the most out of our app and your Bible study time—encouraging you to know God more deeply and spend time in His Word.

Here are the major changes:
-We’ve reorganized where tools and settings exist in the split-window, main menu, and top toolbar
-The split-window now has four primary functions that are easy to toggle between: Resource Guide, Parallel Resource, Notes, and Lookup
-The main menu is now more simplified, giving quick access to your notes & highlights, reading history, the in-app store, and the messaging center
-The top toolbar has a new settings feature, giving you quick access to what matters most
- Optimized for iPhone X

If you’re enjoying our app, please give us a rating!

This update is so big it deserves a drum roll. We are adding AUDIO to NKJV Bible by Olive Tree! Now you can listen to your favorite audio Bibles and Christian ebooks—anytime, anywhere.

We have also made extensive changes to the library, offering a grid view, sorting between books and audio, and direct access to library settings. You can now easily manage your resources, taking inventory on how much space they are using on your device, and offload them for later. Lastly, we have made changes to our in-app store to make it cleaner and easier to use.

Loving the app? Give us a rating! We always appreciate it.

Hello, Olive Tree users! Many of you suggested that we make returning to a specific note or spot in your reading easier. We hope this update will fulfill that need! Now, when you open the main menu in the top left, you will see a reorganized list. After you drill down into a note or other item, and return to the main menu, shortcuts will appear. Additionally, you can long tap on these shortcuts for a preview. Lastly, we increased the visibility of Verse of the Day and Olive Tree Messages in the main menu.

We hope these changes will improve your study time! If you have any positive or negative feedback, please share it in a review.

Hey, Olive Tree users! Here’s a fun update to our reading plans in time for the new year. Now you can select a preferred Bible translation for each of your plans! There are also a few small bug fixes in this update. We hope these changes serve you well through Christmas and blesses you in 2020.

Ready for some good news? Audio reading plans are now available! If you have an audio Bible in your library, you can now select it as your preferred translation for your plans. Also, this update contains a good amount of bug fixes.

If this news makes you happy, we'd love to hear about it in a review.

Finishing a reading plan is a BIG DEAL — especially for those of you who complete year-long plans. So, we've added a surprise message at the end of your reading plan. You'll need to complete one to see what it is though, so start reading!
Also, if you've experienced any problems with scrolling or blank text, we've got a bug fix in here for you.

Due to necessary changes, all users will need to log back into their Olive Tree accounts. This update provides a prompt, encouraging users to sign in.
Due to necessary changes, all users will need to log back into their Olive Tree accounts. This update provides a prompt, encouraging users to sign in.

Introducing Bible Study Pack Subscriptions!

Have you ever felt overwhelmed by all the different Bible study tools out there? It can be difficult to know what fits your needs. With so many choices out there, where do you start?

We've been there and that's why we created the Olive Tree Bible Study Packs. You can get hand-picked Bible study tools PLUS guided training. We're offering you a 14-day free trial of our new Bible Study Packs! Install the latest version, choose the study Pack that best meets your needs and study the Bible like never before!

This update also includes a few good bug fixes and additions:

-iOS 14 support
-New! Verse of the Day Widget
-New! iPad pointer effects
-A fix for reading plan progress buttons so that they show up more reliably

Have you ever felt overwhelmed by all the different Bible study tools out there? It can be difficult to know what fits your needs. With so many choices out there, where do you start?

We’ve been there and that’s why we created the Olive Tree Bible Study Packs. You can get hand-picked Bible study tools PLUS guided training. We're offering you a 14-day free trial of our new Bible Study Packs! Install the latest version, choose the study Pack that best meets your needs and study the Bible like never before!

This update also includes a few good bug fixes and additions:

-iOS 14 support
-New! Verse of the Day Widget
-New! iPad pointer effects
-A fix for reading plan progress buttons so that they show up more reliably

Hello, Olive Tree fans! This update includes a few good bug fixes and additions:

-Bible Study Pack Subscription support
-iOS 14 support
-New! Verse of the Day Widget
-New! iPad pointer effects
-A fix for reading plan progress buttons so that they show up more reliably.
-Added login section when hitting a DRM issue

If you're enjoying the app, please leave us a review!

Hello, Olive Tree fans! This update has several bug fixes, including:
- Improved behavior when resizing the split window
- Fixed some advanced search operations and crash issues
- Fixed an issue where tapping the audio player bar on the main screen did not open the full Now Playing screen
- Performance improvement at startup for large libraries
- Improved font sizing in Resource Guide section headers and cross-references
- Improved usability of notes in text
- Improved reliability of window sync
- Improved reliability of keeping the current location visible when switching scrolling modes
- Fixed not being able to scroll to the end of resources in Parallel window
- Fixed an issue where some sections of the Resource Guide did not appear
- Improved reliability of Next Book and Next Chapter gestures
- Improved chart previews in Resource Guide
- Improved formatting of text copied from non-Bible resources
- Added an option to the Verse of the Day widget to follow the translation selected in the main app
- Plus several additional improvements and fixes
Enjoying the app? Please leave us a review. We would greatly appreciate it!
